response.original_title: 蟲極道蜜団子抗争編 弐ノ巻
response.overview: The city that never sleeps, where insects gather, is now beginning to shake violently.The stirring of a family of martial-arts insectivores, ----, which gathers together half-breed insects who do not belong to a gang and starts a war.There was always a shadow...  It is Ginko, the bewitching queen bee of the wasp family.Ginko's scheming, which does not choose any means. There is no righteousness, chivalry, humanity, or love.The wasp family expands using the honey dumplings that drive the insects crazy as a source of funds.The wings of the beautiful lady swallowtail butterfly stain the moonlight with fresh blood, and our chivalrous cumulonimbus...we call him "Mushizashi-ki" Hitoshi's white blade of divine speed cleaves away the swarming insects!  The war over the honey dumplings and the course of Mitsuki and Kyoko's love... now heads for a fierce climax!
response.title: Insect Yakuza Mitsudango Conflict Vol. 2
